Detailed Description

This visitor is used in calculating the Halstead volume metric for a RHS.

It actually just counts the operators and operands on a RHS. Use this by applying the visitor and then using Halstead's formula on the counts. Union, concatension, option and the closures count as operators; terminals and non-terminals count as operands. At the moment I count the empty string as an operator, though perhaps this should be an operand (?).
